summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2084, for the improvement of Midvale Avenue and Midvale Avenue produced, from North Thirty-ninth Street to North Fiftieth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all manholes, flush-tanks, catch basins and other appurtenances necessary for the proper drainage and sewerage of said district; under Ordinance No. 21178, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
